thread.title: Bank of India Recruitment 2017 – Faculty Posts

author: publisher5
title: Bank of India Recruitment 2017 – Faculty Posts

organizations.name: faculty posts bank of india recruitment

text: Bank of India Recruitment 2017 – Faculty Posts Bank of India Recruitment 2017 – Faculty Posts: Lucknow Zonal Office, Bank of India (BOI) has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Faculty vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 20-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Bank of India Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 04 Name of the Post: Faculty Age Limit: Candidates age should be min 25 to max 63 years. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Graduation, have a flair teaching & have computer knowledge. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in written test and personal interview & Demonstration/ Presentation. How to Apply : Eligible candidates can send their application in (Hard Copy) supported by necessary documents to The Zonal Manager, Bank of India, Rural and financial inclusion Department, Star House, Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow – 226010 on or before 20-03-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 20-03-2017. For more details like eligibility, remuneration, job profile, selection procedure & other information click on the link given below….
